Name: Zether
About the game: Zether is a VR game where a flying whale (you) has to catch all the pearls and free the flying fishes. Try to complete all the levels as fast as possible to reach the highest score ! Zether includes seven levels and a free-flight mode. An accessible game Zether can be entierely played with head movements and, therefore, is accessible to anyone. Zether is a 3D runner designed with tetraplegic gamers. A calibration menu allows each player to adjust the sensibility to match his capacities.
